org.andrewkilpatrick.elmGen
Class EEPromProgrammer

java.lang.Object
  org.andrewkilpatrick.elmGen.EEPromProgrammer

public class EEPromProgrammer
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the host-side protocol, programming and verification parts of a hardware EEPROM programmer for writing to an i2c EEPROM. The protocol is compatible with Andrew Kilpatrick's Arduino-based EEPROM programmer firmware. Native RXTX drivers must be installed on your system for this to work.

Author:
andrew

public byte[] read(int start,
                   int length)
            throws java.io.IOException
Reads data from the EEPROM.

Parameters:

length - the number of bytes to read (must be 1-16)

java.io.IOException - if there is a programmer error
